title: PILING ŠAMPON ZA ČIŠČENJE LASIŠČA, NATURAVIT, 250ML

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Coco-glucoside, Perlite, Disodium laureth sulfosuccinate, Polyacrylate-33, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Sodium gluconate, Benzyl alcohol, Sodium cocoyl isethionate, Sodium lauroamphoacetate, Sodium methyl cocoyl taurate, Sodium hydroxide, Glyceryl oleate, Saccharide isomerate, Dehydroacetic acid, Hydrolyzed wheat protein, Linalool, Citric acid, Potassium sorbate, Hexyl cinnamal, Cannabis sativa seed oil, Parfum.
